channel.title: Client/Server help?
channel.description:
Okay, Well... I would like to learn how to build a server... Starting from scratch with economy I want and etc
Also, I'd prefer If I had help.. I also need a hoster, Willing to pay them to host until christmas when I can buy VPS.

item.title: Client/Server help?
item.dc:creator: @iKapa iKapa
item.description:
@iKapa wrote:

If you’re going to start from scratch it’d be extremely difficult. Unless you extremely proficient with java I’d just doing what I done. Start with a full source, add some good things/remove bad things etc. Then start with a basic source, something that has the bare minimum, this is mainly so you have pretty much all the coding knowledge for the next bit. Start with a completely blank source. Nothing in there (except the blank files).

GL either way. I’d be willing to help if you ever needed help.

Read full topic

item.title: Client/Server help?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Questions, post:1, topic:318948”]Okay, Well… I would like to learn how to build a server… Starting from scratch with economy I want and etc

Also, I’d prefer If I had help… I also need a hoster, Willing to pay them to host until christmas when I can buy VPS.[/quote]when you mean starting from scratch do you mean a cleaned source or like from nothing?
And you cant ask for a host in server help.

Read full topic
